CustomField.description: Indicates how many times record was re-processed in Salesforce after Processing State is updated to Retry. The system will try 3 times to reprocess based on Nice interaction reprocessor flow which will increment this field each time reprocessing is attempted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates how many times record was re-processed in Salesforce after Processing State is updated to Retry. The system will try 3 times to reprocess based on Nice interaction reprocessor flow which will increment this field each time reprocessing is attempted.
CustomField.label: Retry Process Count
